```{r}
masks = readRDS('~/data/RObjs/masks.rds')
images = readRDS('~/data/RObjs/images.rds')
```




### creat single cell experiment from images and masks
```{r}

spe <- cytomapper::measureObjects(masks, 
                      image = images, 
                      img_id = "sampleid",
                      return_as = "spe")

saveRDS(spe, "~/data/RObjs/spe.rds")
```
